name: Attack of the Ohioan Turkeys
description:
You are a hunter, hunting turkeys for Thanksgiving. Despite being a very profitable job this time of year, and being seemingly low risk to people in other areas, it is very very dangerous.

Why, you may ask?

You live in Ohio.

The very place that was so insane that it is, according to Google, the setting for Elden Ring. You can't just drive away, the Ohighway is covered in potholes! Also the turkeys have spaceships and teleporters this year and can fly for some reason so that doesn't help...

In Ohio, the turkeys hunt you!

Some assets used:

https://screamingbrainstudios.itch.io/photorealistic-texture-pack

https://ggbot.itch.io/psx-style-cars

https://craigsnedeker.itch.io/classic64-asset-library

Everything else made entirely by me!

https://www.youtube.com/@PixelRunnerYT
